headline: West Synchrony™ Prefillable Syringe System Launches at CPHI: Redefining a system-level solution for drug delivery
summary: West Pharmaceutical Services, Inc. (NYSE: WST), a global leader in innovative solutions for injectable drug administration, today announced the launch of its West Synchrony™ Prefillable Syringe (PFS) System at CPHI Worldwide in Frankfurt, Germany. This innovative system marks a significant shift in drug delivery solutions by offering a fully verified platform from a single supplier that will be commercially available in January 2026.

thumbnail.caption: Synchrony is a trademark of West Pharmaceutical Services, Inc. in the United States and other jurisdictions.
